question: Paying for the COVID-19 Vaccine
text:
Paying for the COVID-19 Vaccine
          
        
If you have coverage through Pennie, you will not have to pay anything out-of-pocket to receive a FDA-approved 
vaccine
, including any co-pays, coinsurance, or deductibles. This is true, whether your provider is in-network or out-of-network.
There are currently two authorized COVID-19 Vaccines. You can find more information about the Pennsylvania COVID-19 Vaccine plan at the PA Department of Healths 
COVID-19 Vaccine Information
 website.
